Package com.sri.ai.grinder.sgdpllt.rewriter.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultTopRewriter
    A top rewriter combining a list of given top rewriters.
    Exhaustive
    Applies a base rewriter exhaustively.
    FirstOf
    Applies a list of base rewriters until one of them modifies the original expression, returning this as the overall result.
    IfEquals<T>
    A Switch extension that compares a key maker's result to a predefined value and executes a given base rewriter if they are equal and returns the same expression otherwise.
    IfRewriter
    A TopRewriter that executes one of two base top rewriters based on a predicate.
    Recursive
    Applies a base rewriter on an expression and then recursively on sub-expressions.
    Switch<T>
    A rewriter that stores a map from keys in some type to base Rewriters and a key maker function to Expressions to the key type.
